title: Lemonade Thinks Tesla Full Self Driving Is So Good It Wants To Offer Free Auto Insurance
description: Tesla's Full Self-Driving (FSD), which is currently only available in “supervised” mode, may soon gain a new advantage over competitors. descriptionSummary: Lemonade, a forward-thinking insurance provider, is contemplating a game-changing offer: providing complimentary coverage to Tesla owners equipped with its Full Self-Driving technology in supervised mode. This innovative approach could give Teslas a significant edge over rivals.

title: Hyundai Ioniq 3 Spied as the Electric Successor to the Veloster

title: Germany’s Auto Industry Faces 200,000 Job Cuts Amid EV Shift
description: Germany’s once-dominant automotive sector is facing its harshest reckoning in decades. descriptionSummary: Germany's storied automotive industry is grappling with its most severe crisis in recent history. Widespread job losses are predicted, potentially exceeding 200,000, as struggling manufacturers face declining sales, rising costs, and a challenging shift towards sustainability.

description: Toyota’s hydrogen journey hit a snag recently. title: America’s Most Stolen Cars – Is Yours at Risk?

title: Hyundai And Kia’s EV Sales Collapsed In October—Expect More Pain Ahead
